name: Delaware Scrapple Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Scrapple – traditionally a blend of pork, cornmeal, flour and spices – finds a home in this creamy game day dip. Mix cooked, chopped scrapple with cream cheese and white Cheddar cheese and season generously with a package of OLD BAY® Crab Cake Classic® Mix. Bake for 30 minutes and serve with assorted crackers or sliced French bread.
ingredients: ½ cup finely shredded white Cheddar cheese
directions: Heat oil in large skillet on medium-high heat
Add scrapple; cook 3 to 4 minutes or until browned, turning occasionally
Coarsely chop scrapple and place in large bowl
Stir cream cheese and shredded cheese into the scrapple
Bake 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly
Serve with assorted crackers or sliced French bread
